name: code-server
description: Code-Server allows you to run VS Code in the browser via a self-hosted server. It enables remote development on lightweight machines or servers and supports extensions, terminals, and SSH for cloud-based coding workflows.
features: Browser-Based VS Code: Full VS Code experience in any browser. Code on any device.
Remote Development: Access powerful servers from lightweight machines. Develop on tablets or Chromebooks.
Extension Support: Install and use your favorite VS Code extensions. Familiar workflow everywhere.
Integrated Terminal: Full terminal access with SSH support. Complete development environment.
Self-Hosted: Run on your own infrastructure for complete control. Your code stays private.
Cross-Platform: Works on Linux, macOS, and cloud servers. Deploy anywhere you need.
